description: Servers overview detailed stats for MetricZ

panels.description: Server uptime since start
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Metrics update duration in game server

targets.expr: max by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_update_duration_seconds{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})

panels.title: Update Duration

panels.title: Server FPS Average

panels.title: Server FPS Last

panels.title: Server FPS Max

panels.title: AI Count

targets.expr: sum by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_weapons{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})
sum by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_magazines{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})
sum by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_optics{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})
sum by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_suppressors{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})
sum by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_ammo{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})
sum by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_ammo_boxes{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})
sum by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_explosives{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})
sum by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_explosives_detonated_total{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})
sum by(instance, instance_id, world) (rate(dayz_metricz_weapon_shots_total{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_weapon_shots_total{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})

panels.description: BaseBuildingBase (Fence, Watchtower, ShelterSite, TerritoryFlag, etc)
panels.title: Base Buildings

panels.description: Digged items (DrysackBag, SeaChest, WoodenCrate, FirstAidKit, AmmoBox, Pot, Bear, etc.)
panels.title: Stashes

panels.description: TentBase (Shelter, CarTent, LargeTent, PartyTent, MediumTent)
panels.title: Tents

panels.description: Point in center of world with overcast, wind and fog components
panels.title: Temperature Feels Like

panels.description: Duration of previous MetricZ open sink

targets.expr: max by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_sink_begin_duration_seconds{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})

panels.title: Begin Sink Duration

panels.description: Duration of previous MetricZ close sink

targets.expr: max by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_sink_end_duration_seconds{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})

panels.title: End Sink Duration

panels.description:
Duration of specific scrape components  
**MAX by all instances**
panels.title: Collect Metric Group Duration

panels.description:
Duration of previous MetricZ update  
Sum of:
* Open sink
* Collect all metrics
* Commit metrics

targets.expr: max by(instance, instance_id, world) (dayz_metricz_update_duration_seconds{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"})

panels.title: Update Duration

panels.description: Total HTTP requests by type and status

targets.expr: sum by(instance, instance_id, world, type, status) (increase(dayz_metricz_http_requests_total{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"}[$__range]))

panels.title: HTTP Requests Status by Type

panels.description: Total bytes sent via HTTP body

targets.expr: sum by(instance, instance_id, world) (increase(dayz_metricz_http_sent_bytes_total{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"}[$__range]))

panels.title: HTTP Sent Bytes

panels.description: Total HTTP callback retries

targets.expr: sum by(instance, instance_id, world) (increase(dayz_metricz_http_retries_total{instance=~"$instance", instance_id=~"$instance_id", world=~"$world"}[$__range]))

panels.title: HTTP Callback Retries

panels.description: Total bytes received from the instance via ingest API
panels.title: Received Bytes

panels.description: Total chunks received from the instance via ingest API
panels.title: Received Chunks Total

panels.description: Total chunked transactions dropped due to TTL expiration
panels.title: Dropped Transactions by TTL

title: MetricZ Servers Overview
